import { useState } from "react" export default function Layout(props) { const [menu, setMenu] = useState("") const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState("hidden") const menuClickHandler = () => { menu === "" ? setMenu("is-active") : setMenu("") } const dropdownClickHandler = () => { menu === "" ? setDropdown("hidden") : setDropdown("") } return(
